name: Deadlock Incident
db_logs: ERROR: Deadlock detected in table Users. Process ID 402 waiting for access. Transaction started at 2024-01-15 14:23:45. Lock wait timeout exceeded. Query: SELECT * FROM Users WHERE id = 123 FOR UPDATE;
network_logs: 504 Gateway Timeout - Request ID: req-789. Timestamp: 2024-01-15T14:23:47Z. Response time: 2000ms. Load balancer: lb-prod-01. Target server: app-server-03. Connection timeout after 2000ms.
code_diff:
--- a/src/api/users.py
+++ b/src/api/users.py
@@ -45,6 +45,7 @@ def get_user_profile(user_id: int):
     with db.transaction():
         user = db.query(User).filter(User.id == user_id).first()
+        time.sleep(3)  # Added for debugging
         user_data = fetch_user_metadata(user.id)
         return serialize_user(user, user_data)
